## Discussion

The system calls this method when the Filter Control Provider calls the `notifyRulesChanged` method or returns a [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterControlVerdict] with the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterControlVerdict/updateRules()] property set to YES.

# handleRulesChanged()

**Instance Method**

Handle a rules changed event.

## Declaration

```swift
func handleRulesChanged()
```

## Discussion

The system calls this method when the Filter Control Provider calls the `notifyRulesChanged` method or returns a [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterControlVerdict] with the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterControlVerdict/updateRules()] property set to YES.
title: handleRulesChanged()
